xgb_fine_tune=xgb.XGBClassifier(learning_rate =0.1,
 n_estimators=1000,
n_jobs=-1,
 max_depth=5,
 min_child_weight=1,
 gamma=0,
 subsample=0.8,
 colsample_bytree=0.8,
 objective= 'binary:logistic',
 nthread=4,
 scale_pos_weight=1,
 seed=27)
%timeit xgb_fine_tune.fit(X_train,y_train)
